title: Beat the Beast v1.0.8
description:
Beat the Beast is "Strategy & Action" game with beautiful 3D environments, HD graphics and unique 360 degrees gameplay that will bring you a completely new experience in video games.

Get Beat the Beast now and lose yourself in a unique and beautiful fairy world. Use a vast arsenal of towers, magic powers and obviously your tactical skills and the wisdom to defend your kingdomÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s gates against the beasts.

FEATURES:

- Completely new experience in mobile video games!
- Unique 360 degress gameplay!
- Beautiful 3D environments & HD Graphics!
- 3 Game Modes (Campaign, Survivor & Courageous) that will challenge your tactical skills
- 5 Basic Towers (Hammer, Arbalet, Thunder, Catapult & Magic House)
- 4 Magic Power (Soul extractor, Haunt, Black Hole & Magic Car)
- 14 Different Beasts each with their own skills
- 3 Different World (Desert, Forest & Pyramid)
- Hours of gameplay
- No Ads

What's New:

- Survivor mode issue fixed
Version 1.0.7
- Back key in-game pause/unpause the game
- Minor bugs fix
Version 1.0.6
- Menu screen BGM volume adjustment
- Camera scrolling improvement
- Minor bugs fix
Version 1.0.5
- Minor bugs fix
Version 1.0.4
- Levels selection issue fixed
- Double tap adjustment
Version 1.0.3
- Zoom in/out added (Pinch to zoom)
- Double tap to go start position
Version 1.0.2
- 20% extra gold from killed beasts
- Minor bugs fixed
